features.additionalValue: 0.25% discount off our standard Premium Package Home Loan rate
features.additionalInfo: Discounted interest rate for 7 Star NatHERs rated homes. 0.25% discount off our standard Premium Package Home Loan rate
Access is available to online banking features for the product

An offset account is a transactional account that is linked to your home loan. Any balance in this account is offset against an equivalent portion of your home loan balance and generates an interest reduction on your loan
Options to split variable options and fixed rate. Interest rate lock for up to 90 days on fixed rate loans

Preferential term deposit rates. Earn an extra 0.10%p.a. on your Term Deposit accounts so your investments work
harder for you
Preferential insurance rates. Enjoy a 10% discount off CGU General Insurance premiums
Home loan redraw facilities allow borrowers to withdraw the additional funds they put into their variable rate home loan

eligibility.additionalInfo: To be eligible for Gateway's Green Plus Home Loan, the property must have a Nationwide House Energy Rating Scheme (NatHERS), or a Residential Efficiency Scorecard rating of 7 Stars or higher for energy efficiency. This needs to be evidenced with a certificate from an accredited NatHERS or Residential Efficiency Scorecard assessor. New builds or construction plans that have been certified with a 7 Star NatHERS or Residential Efficiency Scorecard rating are also eligible. For security property in the ACT, which has its own system for energy rating, a certificate from a rater licensed in the ACT showing at least a 7 Star rating is also acceptable.

discounts.description: The discount is only available during an introductory period

fees.name: Annual Home Loan Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at settlement and then again on each anniversary

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Nil for Green Home Loan Products

fees.name: Legal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Nil for Green Home Loan Products

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Nil 1st Valuation then $325

Payable if valuation required per property Applies to standard single residential dwellings to $1 million in Metro locations and $500,000 in Regional locations (maximum land area 2.2ha/5 acres)

fees.name: Additional Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Nil for Green Home Loan Products

fees.name: Split Loan Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Two loan accounts (i.e. Variable & Fixed) free. Fee for subsequent splits

fees.name: Construction Progress Inspection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if an inspection is undertaken during the construction period

fees.name: Construction Additional Progress Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable from the 6th draw down (after the first 5 progress draw downs)

fees.name: Construction Final Inspection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when inspection/valuation is undertaken at final draw down

fees.name: Top Up Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Top up fee. Nil 1st top up, then $200
Payable at settlement when increasing loan borrowings

fees.name: Rate Lock Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Payable at application for Rate Lock in the prevailing fixed rate, valid for 90 
days from request date

fees.name: Switch Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Nil for 1st switch then $125.
Payable if Gateway agrees to vary the Loan Agreement on existing Gateway loan as follows:
Product switch (e.g. from variable rate to a fixed rate)
Repayment switch (e.g. P&I to Interest Only)
Split (e.g. into part variable rate and part fixed rate)

fees.name: Security Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Security Variation Fee. Nil 1st var then $200.
Payable if Gateway agrees to vary the security on an existing loan

fees.name: Early Repayment Adjustment (ERA)(break costs)
fees.additionalInfo: Early Repayment Adjustment (ERA) (break costs). Payable if Gateway suffers a loss when loan is repaid in full during a fixed interest rate period. Unascertainable (ERA formula available upon request)
